entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 8:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
